-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A Haskell implementation of the CCNx network protocol.
--   
--   TODO
@package ccnx
@version 0.0.0

module Network.CCNx.Messages

-- | The two types of CCNx messages.
data Message
ContentObjectMessage :: ContentObject -> Message
InterestMessage :: Interest -> Message
data ContentObject
ContentObject :: Signature -> Name -> SignedInfo -> Content -> ContentObject
type Content = ByteString
type Name = [Component]
type Component = String
data SignedInfo
SignedInfo :: PublisherPublicKeyDigest -> Timestamp -> (Maybe Type) -> (Maybe FreshnessSeconds) -> (Maybe FinalBlockID) -> (Maybe KeyLocator) -> SignedInfo
data Interest
Interest :: Name -> (Maybe MinSuffixComponents) -> (Maybe MaxSuffixComponents) -> (Maybe PublisherID) -> (Maybe Exclude) -> (Maybe ChildSelector) -> (Maybe AnswerOriginKind) -> (Maybe Scope) -> (Maybe Nonce) -> Interest
type PublisherPublicKeyDigest = String
data Exclude
Exclude :: (Maybe AnyBloom) -> [(Component, Maybe AnyBloom)] -> Exclude
data AnyBloom
Any :: AnyBloom
Bloom :: String -> AnyBloom
type ChildSelector = Int
type AnswerOriginKind = Int
type Scope = Int
type Nonce = String
type MinSuffixComponents = Int
type MaxSuffixComponents = Int
type Timestamp = Word16
type FreshnessSeconds = Int
type FinalBlockID = String
data Type
DATA :: Type
ENCR :: Type
GONE :: Type
KEY :: Type
LINK :: Type
NACK :: Type
data KeyLocator
Key :: String -> KeyLocator
Certificate :: String -> KeyLocator
KeyName :: Name -> (Maybe PublisherID) -> KeyLocator
data Signature
Signature :: (Maybe DigestAlgorithm) -> (Maybe Witness) -> SignatureBits -> Signature
type DigestAlgorithm = String
type Witness = String
type SignatureBits = String
data PublisherID
PublisherIDPublisherPublicKeyDigest :: PublisherPublicKeyDigest -> PublisherID
PublisherCertificateDigest :: String -> PublisherID
PublisherIssuerKeyDigest :: String -> PublisherID
PublisherIssuerCertificateDigest :: String -> PublisherID

module Network.CCNx
